title: Home To Kentucky
description:
A treacherous journey. Wagons packed with gold. Will the McCoys outrun a group of lawmen or swing from the gallows?   Kansas, 1865. Wiley McCoy can’t wait to return home. He counts down the days until his family can stop laying low and return to Kentucky with the rightfully plundered valuables they took back for the South. But crossing the open prairie with four wagons full of gold may bring Wiley a lethal set of new problems.With desperate outlaws and opportunistic deserters at every turn, Wiley and the other McCoys must watch their backs to survive. But they never expected their greatest enemy to come in the form of ten brilliant Pinkerton detectives… Can Wiley make it home before the lawmen slip a rope around his neck?Home to Kentucky is the second book in The McCoys: Before the Feud saga of historical Western novels. If you like determined heroes, realistic Southern settings, and quests for justice, then you’ll love Thomas A. McCoy’s treacherous wagon ride. 
Buy Home to Kentucky to ride along with the McCoys today
author: Thomas A.  McCoy
